sub_title: Sales Director, Netherlands at Aker Carbon Capture
summary:
An experienced commercial manager in a wide range of industries, including oil & Gas, petrochemicals, mining, specialty & base chemicals, food, beverage, pharmaceuticals and water. Both CAPEX and OPEX. Global key accounts and direct sales as well as agent and distributor management. 

MSC in Chemical Engineering as well as in Business Administration. Well versed in marketing, legal, supply chain and finance. Strong cultural awareness. Creative problem solver.

Motivated by learning and continuous improvement. Always focussed on solutions. Interest in people and their drivers.
